If.Code: Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(Colors.MediumPurple, "[Profile Message!]: ", Colors.Yellow, "Please stand by as the functions are being activated!");

PickUp.QuestName: Patience is a Virtue that We Don't Need

TurnIn.QuestName: Patience is a Virtue that We Don't Need

PickUp.QuestName: Coward Delivery... Under 30 Minutes or it's Free

Code.UseWhen: Unit(25761, u => u.OwnedByUnit == Me && u.DistanceSqr > 30f*30f) != null

Code.Text: Waiting for prisoner to catch up.

Code.TerminateWhen: Unit(25761, u => u.OwnedByUnit == Me && u.DistanceSqr <= 20f*20f) != null

TurnIn.QuestName: Coward Delivery... Under 30 Minutes or it's Free

Code.Code: if ((Me.CurrentTarget == null || Me.CurrentTarget.Entry != 25478) && Unit(25478) != null) Unit(25478).Target();

Code.TerminateWhen: Unit(25584) == null || Unit(25584, u => u.HasAura(45775)) != null || Object(187875) != null

PickUp.QuestName: I'm Being Blackmailed By My Cleaner

TurnIn.QuestName: I'm Being Blackmailed By My Cleaner

PickUp.QuestName: Help Those That Cannot Help Themselves

TurnIn.QuestName: Help Those That Cannot Help Themselves
